news.title: Paper accepted at Joint Statistical Meetings
news.description: Our paper on Bayesian Hierarchical Modeling of Large-Scale Math Tutoring Dialogues has been accepted at JSM 2025.

news.title: Academic Innovation Fund Grant Awarded
news.description: Received $12,435 to develop AI-powered technical interview practice tools for data science students.

news.title: Invited Talk at JMM 2025
news.description: Will be presenting 'Text-as-Data in Mathematics Education' at the Joint Mathematics Meeting in Seattle.

news.title: New collaboration with MIDAS
news.description: Started a new research collaboration with Michigan Institute for Data Science on large-scale analysis of educational dialogues.
